title: Justin999
author: Justin999
content: Can you share some noticeable growth based altcoins names  which were launch in 2022 and 2023? For example: Arbitrum a new altcoin that launched in 2023 and become entered in top coins list. Then pepe! A memecoin which is also launched in 2023 and get so much attraction and it is standing among top100 altcoins. Can you please write down such types of new altcoins names with having such massive growth? I want to analysis those for altcoins for future purpose   I Don't recommend anyone to buy anything. DYOR

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Arbitrum for me is one of the recent projects that launched recently. We all know how this layer-2 network really became popular because of first their airdrop.Arbitrum because it is a layer-2 network, a new one that will compete with other layer-2 networks that already exist. And we saw how the total value  locked (TVL) on most of Decentralized Finance (DeFi) platforms on this chain really grow.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: Arbitrum are one of the tokens I'm anticipating to have a massive price growth as we approach bull market. Aptos and Optimism are other coins that i have the same hope of going the same path. I'm doing cost averaging into these tokens. These tokens haven't experienced a bull market, a massive price growth and has a strong support behind it. These are the factors of the recent successful tokens last bull market, along with the trend, I hope that these tokens will get us good profits.I don't shill but I personally believe that new tokens or tokens created during the bear market are the one who will rise during the bull market.

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: Arbitrum is really good, but next to it its direct competitor Optimism is also very impressive. Both remind me of a competition in another technology field between Windows and Linux.- Similar to Window's development focus on optimizing different products, Arbitrum makes me imagine the direction they are pursuing in terms of developing everything of a complete ecosystem with full fields that can be approached near.- With Optimism, it gives the feeling that anyone can easily create a new L2 based on its core, just like Linux where everyone can deploy their own operating system.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: I can't say if this can be considered but one noticeable launched through airdrop was Optimism as well. It has made a noise last year when its airdrop was released to the public and that was their governance token. So, it's Arbitrum and Optimism that I can remember that has been notable for their launching. Anyway, if you want to analyze the newly launched coins you may go through the list of new altcoins listed on coinmarketcap and coingecko but check it out if they really have been released for this year.https://coinmarketcap.com/new/https://www.coingecko.com/en/new-cryptocurrencies

comments.author: VFalcon
comments.body: If you don't know where to invest, I suggest you try to participate in Fairspin tournament, play their games or bet on TFS - it's a great chance to win extra money. Invest the money you win in any coin you are afraid to invest your own money in

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: VFalcon on October 26, 2023, 10:16:47 AM If you don't know where to invest, I suggest you try to participate in Fairspin tournament, play their games or bet on TFS - it's a great chance to win extra money. Invest the money you win in any coin you are afraid to invest your own money inso are you serious about this? spamming altcoin section with your gambling tournament? why not  just put this in Games and Rounds or in social media because this seems to be out of topic here in altcoin topics.and besides OP is asking about potential coin that he might be invested and not to gamble.Place your post in correct thread please.Quote from: abel1337 on October 26, 2023, 04:01:36 AMI don't shill but I personally believe that new tokens or tokens created during the bear market are the one who will rise during the bull market.Waiting for some coins that you will name mate specially those new project created In bear market like Arbitrum and other potential coins.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: One of the noticeable altcoins that successfully started and so far created an impact is the Arkham (ARKM) platform which the main aim of deanonymizing the blockchain. Arkham got some stir in the market months ago all because of the airdrop scheme it implemented which, of course, led to many making a good amount of money - unfortunately I failed to be a part of that airdrop. I am sure this project will continue to be making its name in the world of cryptocurrency as long as the team will stick to their solid vision, mission and goals.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: I think you will have a difficult to finding these.You're requesting for all-token progress + launch, meanwhile most of coin-provider only provide you a recently add token and not showing the fully grow for each token only maybe 24h-7day grow.Hard to give you a list for these.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Justin999 on October 26, 2023, 01:52:08 AMCan you please write down such types of new altcoins names with having such massive growth? I want to analysis those for altcoins for future purposeNeutronArchwayArbitrumCyberconnectArkhamSo far these are the projects that are farely new and doing a considerable marketcap. Yes some of them have Binance listing and some with isolated sale. Not sure if its worth your money but of course if you wanna ride bull run pick some new ones that havent made ATH last year and will see how they will perform in the next bull run.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: If you want altcoins to invest in for future analysis, I will recommend you to go through this post made here by Ratimov to have a look at his portfolio of Altcoin investments. I am sharing Ratimov's portfolio with you so that you can choose by yourself which altcoins investment that worth investing in. Be aware that anyone you choose to invest in finally, is at your own risk and blame. Nobody should be held responsible for that.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Justin999 on October 26, 2023, 01:52:08 AMCan you please write down such types of new altcoins names with having such massive growth? I want to analysis those for altcoins for future purposeI don't know what the indicators are to say a project has massive growth, whether it has a minimum increase of up to 10x from the initial price, or the ecosystem has growth . Here are some projects I can provide:1. Aptos (APT)2. Sui (SUI)3. Arbitrum (ARB)4. Neutron (NTRN)5. CyberConnect (CYBER)6. Arkham (ARKM)BTW, what purpose do you need this data for? Is it for future price analysis purposes? If so, you can share it here too later, I'd love to see it.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: It is not really ideal to keep on investing at these "new" launched ones. First of all 2022 doesn't even feel like recent, we are about to go into 2024, so I would understand 2022 a bit, but 2023 is definitely way too recent, we are literally in 2023 right now.I can sort of understand ARB because it is trying to do something but I can't really understand PEPE type of stuff because it is just a meme coin and I do not understand MEME stuff, like they are not real investments to me and I would suggest staying away from them. I understand some people like them but I personally do not like them at all. The best thing to do would be just realizing that they are bad and you should pick something that is a little bit better.

comments.author: tygeade
comments.body: Quote from: el kaka22 on October 27, 2023, 05:44:50 PMI can sort of understand ARB because it is trying to do something but I can't really understand PEPE type of stuff because it is just a meme coin and I do not understand MEME stuff, like they are not real investments to me and I would suggest staying away from them. I understand some people like them but I personally do not like them at all. The best thing to do would be just realizing that they are bad and you should pick something that is a little bit better.Aside from ARB, there hasn't been all that many which got attention, not that I am saying ARB is great or anything, I am just saying it got attention and was it worthy of attention or not is depending on your own research. Go check the coins and tokens from 2022 and 2023 and you will see that none of them ranks higher than ARB at this point and that's the key point here, if that's the only one then there isn't really anything that could be shockingly different after a while. We need to realize that this is a different view and we can't really make it change for the long term.I hope that we could get to a point where it could be a little different, and yet we are talking about a situation that may not be all that easy to handle in the end. Just look for older ones, there is no urgency to pick the new ones, I get that new ones feels like it could be better than ever but that doesn't mean that we are going to end up with anything that could be a better just because they are new.

comments.author: Justin999
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on October 26, 2023, 12:30:08 PMNeutronArchway ArbitrumCyberconnect ArkhamNot sure if its worth your money but of course if you wanna ride bull run pick some new ones that havent made ATH last year and will see how they will perform in the next bull run.  really appreciate your effect. New altcoins with such movement means those should be kept for future considered for more analysis. Arbitrum Cyberconnect are gained fame and so i know about those but unknown about rest of three. I saw those are also got good response but still need more growth and volume to trust. I want to add sui, optimism in your list as those two are very good and responded by people so well

comments.author: bruges
comments.body: IRONFISHLaunched in April 2023.Posted my review of the coin here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5471428.msg63170495#msg63170495

Imagine buyign a new tokens that could be potential gainer in the future is something exciting. I didnt say old tokens wont do but this new one never experience a bull run season and we might see them on top one of this days.

comments.author: Kelward
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on October 26, 2023, 06:10:10 PMQuote from: Justin999 on October 26, 2023, 01:52:08 AMCan you please write down such types of new altcoins names with having such massive growth? I want to analysis those for altcoins for future purposeI don't know what the indicators are to say a project has massive growth, whether it has a minimum increase of up to 10x from the initial price, or the ecosystem has growth . Here are some projects I can provide:1. Aptos (APT)2. Sui (SUI)3. Arbitrum (ARB)4. Neutron (NTRN)5. CyberConnect (CYBER)6. Arkham (ARKM)BTW, what purpose do you need this data for? Is it for future price analysis purposes? If so, you can share it here too later, I'd love to see it.A big thanks to you for sharing these collection of new altcoins, except for Arbitrum, I'm not familiar with the others. This is because I never put much interest in altcoin information, only in bitcoin and established altcoins like Ethereum and BNB. This is why this thread captures my interest, in the hope that it'll spur my interest in altcoins generally. I'll have to explore this ones that you have shared, like the OP, i can also be able to analyse then for future purposes.Friends experiences in most new altcoins have been a discouragement to me in building interest in them. Because of scam projects and those that'll become worthless with investors losing. I still can't deny the fact that some of this altcoins are profitable, only they seen to me like gambling.
